subject: Economy
topic: Yojana Aayog se NITI Aayog tak ka Parivartan
question_en: What is the primary objective of NITI Aayog?
question_hi: नेतृत्व का मूल उद्देश्य NITI Aayog kaise hota hai?
A_hi: आगामी भारत को ज्ञान प्राप्ति और आज़ादी
explanation_en: The primary objective of NITI Aayog is to promote inclusive growth in India. This involves ensuring balanced development across various sectors and regions, targeting poverty eradication, improving living standards, and fostering overall development.
explanation_hi: नेतृत्व अनुभाइत्व का मूल उत्तमन्त्र्यां का आयात
